actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to lower the percentage requirements of stock in a decedent's estate in order to qualify for section 303 treatment.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the proportion of an estate which must constitute stock in a corporation in order to qualify redemptions of such stock to pay death taxes and expenses for capital gains treatment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to lower the percentage requirements of stock in a decedent's estate in order to qualify for section 303 treatment.
